https://tmrev.io/movie/71350-Chicas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nw8BFECiLN4STxq6Yx4iUBhZXnh.jpg Pilar is a Spanish widow who has raised her three daughters in France. In love with Fernand, the manager of the building in which she lives, she organizes a lunch in her home with the intention of introducing him to the rest of the family. The reunion goes wildly wrong and the family's craziness overtakes. Chicas
